comment: Ms. Strauss was a great and fun teacher. There was a lot of work, but all of it was relevant to workplace writing and will be helpful. She is also very helpful outside of class on assignments both for and not for her class. Don't wait until the last minute and you'll be fine. BUY the book it's useful after the course!
One of the best teachers you can get!!
Wow, just wow. She really is a wonderful teacher. She was fairly easy, but she did reacquire a lot of writing. She was always very clear on her expectations so we knew exactly how we would be graded.

The most wonderful teacher I have ever had. Very clear, concise and consistent in everything she did. Very helpful and understanding of most things, but still a strict grader. I loved her this past semester and I would DEFINITELY recommend her to ANYONE!!
She is awesome!  She is very genuine and truly cares about what she does.
Quite possibly the best professor I've had at Southern Poly. EXTEMELY clear on what to do. Makes class enjoyable!

One of the best professors you can ask for. She is genuine and really will extend a lending hand if you show her that you are actually trying. It is obvious that she loves to teach from the joy she always brings to the classroom.
Professor Strauss, is hand down the best teacher I have ever had. Her class was fun,the work was hard but rewarding and she was wonderful. I wish I could take all my classes with her.
Amazing teacher. Helpful, intelligent, and fun.
I love her class so much! You need hard work but it will come to a good result.
A great professor learning is definitely not hard and it helps that she adds some fun into it, not to mention that she is good looking.
Great Teacher, I enjoyed the class. Take one of her classes you will love it.

Excellent professor that brings a very enthusiastic approach to teaching. The reading and writing material was actually interesting and there were a lot of visual elements. She is not the typical boring English professor. And it helps that she is very attractive. I would recommend her to anyone. Not an easy A but a quality learning experience

Great teacher! She explains everything in great detail and really cares about the grade you get in the class. Tough grader on essays but she gives you more than enough information to do well on the essay. Recommended
